summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Brand Asset Generator (BrandBloom). Backend APIs are fully functional, frontend pages load correctly, authentication system is in place. App runs in demo mode with placeholder images due to EMERGENT_LLM_KEY configuration.

configuration_issues.issue: EMERGENT_LLM_KEY may not be working properly - app falls back to demo mode with placeholder images
configuration_issues.impact: Users get placeholder images instead of real AI-generated assets

ui_bugs.issue: Dashboard page appears blank/loading when accessed without authentication
ui_bugs.expected_behavior: Should show proper authentication message or redirect to login

passed_tests: Homepage loads with URL input form
Brand extraction API (/api/extract-brand) works with stripe.com
Brand data extraction shows colors, fonts, description correctly
Asset generation API (/api/generate-assets) returns proper asset structure
User registration page loads with proper form fields
User login page loads with proper form fields
Homepage navigation and UI elements work correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Verify EMERGENT_LLM_KEY configuration for real AI image generation. Dashboard page authentication flow needs minor improvement to show proper message instead of blank page.
